settings.title: Rye July
settings.content: A month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

settings.title: What is Rye July?
settings.content:
Talk to anyone about whiskey and the conversation is usually dominated by age or provenance, rather than the base ingredient from which it’s made. Just like the variety of grapes in wine, whiskey can be made from a variety of grains - rye, wheat, barley, corn - all of which produce distinct flavours and expressions.

Rye July is a month-long celebration shining a light on whiskey made from rye, the unsung hero of the whiskey world.

settings.title: The beauty of Rye
settings.content:
We are Australia’s only dedicated rye whiskey distillery. The Gospel is crafted and distilled from 100% Australian unmalted rye, which has been cultivated and nurtured by a single farmer in the Murray Mallee region of South Australia. Specifically chosen for its harsh climate, the rye from this area is small and dense – renowned for its distinct, extraordinary flavour and is unmatched by rye from other areas.

Our unmalted rye grain imparts deep, spicy flavours of vanilla, cinnamon and dried fruit, with developing notes of pepper, grass and grain.

Rye whiskey may be the hardest of all whiskeys to distil, but our obsession and dedication makes a damn good drink.

settings.title: Go Dry This Rye July
settings.content:
As Australia’s only dedicated rye whiskey distillery, we set out to create a non-alcoholic rye whiskey alternative that was inclusive of all.

Under the guidance of qualified Sommelier and R&D Distiller Ellie Ash, Responsible Rye spent over a year in development - a commitment to flavour and perfecting the recipe without compromise.

Enjoy Responsible Rye mixed with Dry Ginger Ale and a slice of orange or in a classic whiskey cocktail.

Responsible Rye will be available to purchase from Wednesday 6 July 8:30am AEST.

settings.title: Rye July events in VIc
settings.content:
Join us throughout the month of July and help us celebrate the hardy and determined rye grain.

-- 1 July – Rye July Launch party at Rooftop Bar – TBC
-- 2 July – Distillery Open Day
-- 8 July – Responsible Rye Launch Party at Brunswick Aces – Date TBC with Co-Founder Ben Bowles
-- 9 July – JazzLab Masterclass – TBC
-- 11 July – Stomping Ground x The Gospel Dinner (rye & truffle dinner with beer and whiskey pairings, beer and whiskey cocktails)
-- 15 July – Wolf of the Willows – brewery tour masterclass with Co-Founder Andrew Fitzgerald
-- 16 July – 10 Saints Bar & Beer Garden 630pm-8pm tasting with matching snacks and masterclass by Co-Founder Andrew Fitzgerald
-- 21 July – Inner North Brewing Co – boilermaker night
-- 22 July – Blackhearts & Sparrows Store Tasting, Geelong
-- 22 July – 18th Amendment bar shout, Geelong – TBC
-- 24 July – Sleepy’s – guest chef pop-up with multiple course dinner paired with The Gospel drinks
-- 28 July – The Dispensary Launch Party - details to come - TBC
-- 31 July – Co-Conspirators Boilermaker Event

settings.title: Rye July events in NSW
settings.content:
We'll be heading to Sydney for some of our biggest events to date.

We'd love for our Northerner rye whiskey fanatics to join us in celebratating Rye July. You'll find us here:

-- 13 July – (Aria Restaurant) – TBC
-- 14 July – (Bar Planet) – TBC
-- 15 & 16 July – Whisky Live
-- 17 July – Poor Tom’s Whiskey Hall – joint masterclass with gin and whiskey cocktails

settings.title: A Missing Ingredient
settings.content:
Keep your eyes peeled for the next product to be released under The Dispensary on Wednesday 27 July 8:30am AEST. It could be classified as an essential ingredient, if you will.

More details to come.

settings.title: Win the Ultimate Whiskey Weekend in Melbourne
settings.content:
As part of Rye July, we are giving you the chance to win the Ultimate Whiskey Weekend in Melbourne for you and 3 friends!

Prize includes return flights to Melbourne from any major Australian city, 2 nights accommodation in Melbourne CBD, a distillery tour and a bottle of whiskey, plus an exclusive dinner and bar crawl with The Gospel staff. Valued at nearly $5k!

Enter here.
